channel.title: nginx on Thavanathan
channel.description: Recent content in nginx on Thavanathan

item.title: Deploying Django Application with Nginx and uwsgi
item.description: Introduction In this post we will learn about deploying Django applications. There are many ways to deploy a Django application. we can use either nginx or apache web server. Nginx is just a web server. It doesn’t know how to run Python programs. For this, we need a server which understands how to run python programs. This server is called application server. To run a application server, we can use uwsgi, gunicorn and etc.
